CDAP API 2.6.0

Packages
co.cask.cdap.api Interfaces for program and resource specifications, program lifecycle, runtime context and processors.
co.cask.cdap.api.annotation Annotations used when creating Applications.
co.cask.cdap.api.app An Application is a logical grouping of Streams, Datasets, Flows, Procedures, and other deployable elements.
co.cask.cdap.api.builder Interfaces for constructing specifications.
co.cask.cdap.api.common Commonly used utility functions.
co.cask.cdap.api.data Defines means of integration between programs and data access.
co.cask.cdap.api.data.batch Allows MapReduce jobs to read from and write to datasets.
co.cask.cdap.api.data.stream Stream specification and configuration.
co.cask.cdap.api.dataset Defines APIs for accessing and managing data within CDAP.
co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib Collection of Dataset implementations available out-of-the-box in CDAP.
co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.metrics Defines integration points for Datasets and Metrics system.
co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.module Defines deployment of custom Datasets to make them available within CDAP.
co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.table Provides access to the system-level table Datasets available within CDAP.
co.cask.cdap.api.flow Flow implementations.
co.cask.cdap.api.flow.flowlet Interfaces used in flows and flowlets.
co.cask.cdap.api.mapreduce Defines MapReduce jobs.
co.cask.cdap.api.metrics Defines a way to collect user-defined metrics.
co.cask.cdap.api.procedure Procedure implementations.
co.cask.cdap.api.schedule For running programs periodically.
co.cask.cdap.api.security This package contains interfaces and classes for CDAP security.
co.cask.cdap.api.service Defines ServiceSpecification.
co.cask.cdap.api.service.http Defines a service for handling HTTP requests.
co.cask.cdap.api.spark Defines APIs for defining Spark jobs in CDAP.
co.cask.cdap.api.stream Interfaces for stream interactions.
co.cask.cdap.api.webapp For web application.
co.cask.cdap.api.workflow For constructing workflows.
co.cask.cdap.internal This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
co.cask.cdap.internal.batch This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
co.cask.cdap.internal.builder This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
co.cask.cdap.internal.flow This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
co.cask.cdap.internal.flowlet This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
co.cask.cdap.internal.io This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
co.cask.cdap.internal.lang This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
co.cask.cdap.internal.procedure This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
co.cask.cdap.internal.schedule This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
co.cask.cdap.internal.service This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
co.cask.cdap.internal.service.http This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
co.cask.cdap.internal.spark This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
co.cask.cdap.internal.specification This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
co.cask.cdap.internal.workflow This package contains internal classes for supporting the CDAP API.
